content:
Sure, here are some requirements that can be extracted from the session by Carlos in table form:

| # | Requirement |
| --- | --- |
| 1 | Technology solution for building an identity graph |
| 2 | Ability to track consumer identity across multiple data sets |
| 3 | Real-time data processing and analysis capabilities |
| 4 | High-quality and reliable data sources |
| 5 | Integration with various data sources |
| 6 | Machine learning algorithms for maintaining the identity graph |
| 7 | Graph database for storing and querying the identity graph |
| 8 | Compliance with data security and privacy regulations |
| 9 | Ability to handle large amounts of data |
| 10 | Customer feedback and satisfaction measurement mechanisms |
| 11 | Continuous monitoring and improvement of the identity graph |
